dct_title_s: Plan of new capital Punjab : Chandigarh
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by form lines. Oriented with north towards upper left. Summer and winter winds direction is indicated. Includes index to points of interest. "DRG No. 2/6". "Reg. No. 3541 HE '51-5000'52-3001'53." Punjab, India. Capital Project. Survey of India. Relief shown by form lines. Oriented with north towards upper left. Summer and winter winds direction is indicated. DRG No. 2/6 Punjab Capital Project. "Issued by Director Public Relations, Simla, Punjab." "Reg. No. 3541 HE '51-5000."/ "DRG No. 2/6.". Punjab, India. Director of Public Relations.
